mapper.insert: insert into employees_departure (leavingReason, tool, confirm, handover, note, employeeId) values (#{leavingReason}, #{tool}, #{confirm}, #{handover}, #{note}, #{employeeId});
mapper.select:
select t1.id as employeeDepartureId,
t2.id as employeeId, idWork, name, idNumber, gender, inductionTime, deptName, position,
t1.leavingReason, tool, confirm, handover, note from employees_departure as t1 inner join (select * from employee
and name like concat('%', #{employee.name}, '%')
and deptName like concat('%', #{employee.deptName}, '%')
and state like concat('%', #{employee.state}, '%')
and idWork like concat('%', #{employee.idWork}, '%')
) as t2 on t1.employeeId = t2.id
limit #{startIndex}, 10;
